name: compress
description:
This plugin will add the .ctxt file type which will allow you to compress notes to a smaller version.
NOTE: If you create a link in a compressed file it will NOT show in graph view.
When using this plugin data loss is possible, we've tried to minimise it. But theres always a change. If you do experiance data loss we are not liable. But you may create an issue request with the raw data(do not provide personal info).

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: networkmastered
